items.sentence: You'll find what you're looking for on the top shelf.
Having been invited, Tom and Mary felt obliged to go.
Tom was able to start a fire with a magnifying glass.
Tom never got around to reading that book I lent him.
Tom is the one who suggested that we try it this way.
I had a hard time making myself understood in French.
I know what Tom says he did, but I don't believe him.
We need to persuade Tom to stay until Mary gets here.
Tom had always known that it would happen eventually.
Tom has the bad habit of talking out loud to himself.
